internships.description: Developed Sofia, an Azure-based AI chatbot for real-time policy document Q&A with semantic search and inline citations. Built end-to-end pipeline from document ingestion to conversational AI using Azure OpenAI, Cognitive Search, and Flask backend.

project.name: Sofia - AI Chatbot for Live Document Insights
project.description: Production GenAI application providing natural-language Q&A over internal PDF policy documents with accurate citations
features: Semantic search with Azure Cognitive Search indexing
In-response clickable citations pointing to source documents
Live document upload and indexing pipeline
MySQL-backed tagging system for citation categorization
Dark mode UI with responsive design

achievements: Architected and deployed Sofia chatbot with React/Next.js frontend and Python Flask backend, achieving 99.9% uptime while scaling to 100+ concurrent users
Engineered semantic search pipeline using Azure Cognitive Search with custom skillsets for PDF text/image indexing and Azure OpenAI embeddings
Implemented query enhancement and summarization using Azure OpenAI ChatCompletionSkill, reducing API response time by 25% through optimized routing
Built citation management system with MySQL database for tagging and metadata, enabling clickable source references in chat responses
Automated deployment workflows on Azure App Service with HTTPS security, cutting release lead time to ~12 minutes
